text: William Howard White (born June 16, 1954) is an American lawyer, businessman and politician. He was the 60th mayor of Houston from 2004 to 2010. He is a member of the Democratic Party. White was the Democratic nominee for Governor of Texas in the 2010 election, however he lost to Republican Governor Rick Perry. He was the U.S. Deputy Secretary of Energy under President Bill Clinton from 1993 to 1995. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Profile at CityMayors.com * * Bill White for Texas Governor Official campaign website * Bill White's Environmental Record at GreenHoustonTX Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Houston Category:Politicians from San Antonio, Texas Category:Lawyers from San Antonio Category:Businesspeople from San Antonio Category:Lawyers from Houston Category:Businesspeople from Houston Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Bill White (Texas politician)
